M

Manager - Class in ca.gkelly.engine
Abstract class to be extended to create managers
Example: One manager for main menu, another for game, then switch between them as needed
Manager() - Constructor for class ca.gkelly.engine.Manager
 
middle - Variable in class ca.gkelly.engine.input.Mouse
